user.title: Set up VyOS Router
user.description:
For **version_dhcp_server**, vyos-version 1.4 and below should use 7
However, you could extract this information from the last line of `/config/config.boot` Or using this command
```bash
cat /config/config.boot | grep -Eo 'dhcp-server@[0-9]*'
```

data.url: VyOS API url (needs https:// and port)
data.tracker_interfaces: Interface to track arp (use comma without space to specify multiple interfaces)
